author: Unity
description:
Create World Space UI with UI Toolkit in Unity 6.2 

In this technical tutorial, Unity expert Cam Ayres demonstrates how you can get started with the new World Space capabilities for UI Toolkit in Unity 6.2, taking you from a blank canvas to a functional, interactive 3D menu.

See what's possible:
-Build a complex UI visually with the UI Builder.
-Create reusable styles with Style Classes.
-Add interactivity with pseudo-classes like :hover.
-Deploy UI into a 3D scene using a UI Document component.
-Go from a 2D overlay to an interactive 3D World Space interface.

UI Toolkit can help you build responsive, data-driven interfaces for your industrial applications, from digital twin dashboards to AR training overlays. 

Learn more about UI Toolkit:
https://docs.unity3d.com/6000.2/Documentation/Manual/UIElements.html

Explore Unity industrial applications: https://on.unity.com/4kpptyZ

Start your free Industry trial: http://on.unity.com/4lAhMHg
title: UI Toolkit for Industry
